title: Online Bus booking Application
Tools Used: Springboot, MongoDB, Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript
description: This an Android, Web Application which allow users to book tickets and to fetch booking history.Allows SuperAdmin to perform CRUD Operations.

title: Patient Medication Application
Tools Used: Springboot, MongoDB, Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript
description: A fully functional application, which allows patients to View, Book Appointments, View Prescriptions, View Medicines

title: Employee Management Application
Tools Used: Springboot, MongoDB, Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript
description: A fully functional application, which allows SuperAdmin to View Employees,Performs CRUD Operations, Update data, salaries

title: Parivahan Dashboard
Tools Used: Springboot, SQL, Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript
description: An Interactive dashboard built with Java and Springboot to analyze Indian Registration Data. It Calculates YoY and QoQ growth and allows filtering by state, year, quarter and manufacture
